generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white crosswalk markings, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a low metal fence and curbs.
- building: A large building with multiple windows and a sign reading "JUSTICE" is visible on the left, and a church-like building with a rose window is visible on the right.
- fence: A metal fence with vertical bars is present along the left side of the road, running parallel to the building.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: A green traffic light is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the church.
- vegetation: Some greenery is visible on the far right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the far right side of the image.
- car: A black car is visible driving on the road, approaching the crosswalk.
